title: Designing Active Learning Strategies for Biology Problem-Centered Learning

context.prior_knowledge: Basic biological concepts and understanding of applications in social domains
context.additional_context: A non-degree educational program for working professionals, conducted in a limited technological environment based on smartphones

learning_goals: Learners can analyze real-world social issues and derive solutions by applying biological principles.
Learners can perform self-directed learning by applying metacognitive strategies during problem-solving processes through web-based modules.
Learners can collaboratively interpret complex biological concepts and present results through team-based projects.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
